item.title: Markdown 文件生成 TOC
item.description: 生成 Github Readme 文件 TOC 目录 的简单脚本 # <?php /** * site: https://github.com/xingshaocheng/simple-php-github-toc */ if(count($argv) < 2){ exit("Please input github file url, eg 'php github-toc.php https://github.com/xingshaocheng/architect-awesome/blob/master/README.md'.\n"); } $url = $argv[1]; #$url = "https://github.com/xingshaocheng/architect-awesome/blob/master/README.md"; function get_anchor($content){ preg_match_all("/href=\"(.*)\">/iUs", $content, $anchor_arr); if(count($anchor_arr) > 0){ return $anchor_arr[1][0]; } return ""; } function get_title($content){ preg_match_all("/a\>(.*)$/iUs", $content, $title_arr); if(count($title_arr) > 0){ return trim($title_arr[1][0]); } return ""; } $content = file_get_contents($url); preg_match_all("/<article(.*)<\/article>/iUs", $content, $article); $article_html = $article[0][0]; preg_match_all("/<h([1-6])>(.
